00023 Int_t FileNotOK(Char_t file[]){
00024   ifstream f;
00025   f.open(file);
00026   return f.fail();
00027 }

00030 Int_t Usage(char *argv[])
00031 {
00032   cout << "\n Usage:" << argv[0] << "[-hxg][-f <runID>][--banana][--error-detector]" << endl;
00033   cout << "\n Description: " << endl;
00034   cout << "\t Make plots for Run <runID>." << endl;
00035   cout << "\n Options:" << endl;
00036   cout << "\t -f <runID> " << endl;
00037   cout << "\t --error-detector  plot error detector histograms" << endl;
00038   cout << "\t --feedback        plot feedback histograms" << endl;
00039   cout << "\t --raw             plot raw histograms" << endl;
00040   cout << "\t --banana          plot kinematics reconstruction for all strips" << endl;
00041   cout << "\t --summary         plot summary" << endl;
00042   cout << "\t --strip <stID>    plot kinematics reconstruction for strip <stID>" << endl;
00043   cout << "\t -g \t launch ghostview" << endl;
00044   cout << "\t -h \t show this help    " << endl;
00045   cout << "\t -x \t show example    " << endl;
00046   cout << endl;
00047   exit(0);
00048 }

00061 void ColorSkime()
00062 {
00063     const Int_t NRGBs = 5;
00064     const Int_t NCont = 255;
00065 
00066     Double_t stops[NRGBs] = { 0.00, 0.34, 0.61, 0.84, 1.00 };
00067     Double_t red[NRGBs]   = { 0.00, 0.00, 0.87, 1.00, 0.51 };
00068     Double_t green[NRGBs] = { 0.00, 0.81, 1.00, 0.20, 0.00 };
00069     Double_t blue[NRGBs]  = { 0.51, 1.00, 0.12, 0.00, 0.00 };
00070     TColor::CreateGradientColorTable(NRGBs, stops, red, green, blue, NCont);
00071     //gStyle->CreateGradientColorTable(NRGBs, stops, red, green, blue, NCont);
00072     gStyle->SetNumberContours(NCont);
00073 }

00078 // Histogram Checker 
00079 Int_t IsOK(const Char_t histname[])
00080 {
00081   ofstream logfile;
00082   TObject* OK = gDirectory->Get(histname);
00083   if (!OK) logfile << "The histogram : " << histname << " doesn't exist in root file. Ignored." << endl;
00084   return OK ? 1 : 0;
00085 }

00088 void AsymPlot::PlotStrip(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps, Int_t stID)
00089 {
00090   cout << "PlotStrip stID=" << stID << endl;
00091 
00092   gStyle->SetOptLogz(0);  gStyle->SetOptStat(11);  gStyle->SetOptFit(0);
00093   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);
00094 
00095   ps->NewPage();
00096   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");  
00097 
00098   Char_t histname[100];
00099 
00100   // banana
00101   sprintf(histname,"t_vs_e_st%d",stID);
00102   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("colz");  CurC->Update();  ps->NewPage();
00103 
00104   // mass_vs_e correlation
00105   sprintf(histname,"mass_vs_e_ecut_st%d",stID);
00106   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("contz"); 
00107   sprintf(histname,"mass_vs_energy_corr_st%d",stID);
00108   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("same");  CurC->Update();    
00109   ps->NewPage();
00110 
00111   // invariant mass
00112   sprintf(histname,"mass_nocut_st%d",stID);
00113   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("");  
00114   sprintf(histname,"mass_yescut_st%d",stID);
00115   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("same");    CurC->Update();    
00116 }

00119 void AsymPlot::PlotBanana(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps)
00120 {
00121   gStyle->SetOptLogz(0);
00122   gStyle->SetOptStat(11);
00123   gStyle->SetOptFit(0);
00124   gStyle->SetPalette(1);
00125 
00126   ps->NewPage();
00127   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");  
00128   
00129   CurC->Divide(4,3);
00130   
00131   Char_t histname[100];
00132   Int_t stID;
00133   for (Int_t det=0; det<N_DETECTORS; det++) {
00134 
00135     for (Int_t st=1; st<=NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR; st++){
00136       stID=det*NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR+st;
00137       CurC->cd(st);
00138       sprintf(histname,"t_vs_e_st%d",stID);
00139       if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("colz");  CurC->Update();    
00140     }
00141 
00142     if (det!=N_DETECTORS-1) ps->NewPage();
00143   }
00144 }

00254 void AsymPlot::PlotRaw(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps)
00255 {
00256   rootfile->cd();
00257   rootfile->cd("Raw");  
00258   TH1* bunch_dist_raw              = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_dist_raw");
00259   TH1* strip_dist_raw              = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("strip_dist_raw");
00260   TH1* tdc_raw                     = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("tdc_raw");
00261   TH1* adc_raw                     = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("adc_raw");
00262   TH1* tdc_vs_adc_raw              = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("tdc_vs_adc_raw");
00263 
00264   rootfile->cd();
00265   rootfile->cd("Bunch");  
00266   bunch_dist                 = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_dist");
00267 
00268   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");
00269   gStyle->SetOptLogz(1);
00270   bunch_dist_raw->Draw(); 
00271   bunch_dist->Draw("same"); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00272   gStyle->SetOptLogz(0);
00273   strip_dist_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00274   tdc_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00275   adc_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00276   tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00277 
00278   CurC->Clear(); CurC->Divide(2,2); 
00279   CurC->cd(1) ; bunch_dist_raw->Draw(); bunch_dist->Draw("same");
00280   CurC->cd(2) ; strip_dist_raw->Draw();
00281   CurC->cd(3) ; tdc_raw->Draw();
00282   CurC->cd(4) ; adc_raw -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00283 
00284   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);  ColorSkime();
00285   ps->NewPage();
00286   CurC->cd(1) ; tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw(); 
00287   CurC->cd(2) ; tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw("colz"); 
00288   CurC->cd(3) ; tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw("lego"); CurC->Update(); 
00289 }

00292 void AsymPlot::PlotErrorDetectorSummary(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps)
00293 {
00294   CurC -> SetGridx();
00295 
00296   ps->NewPage();
00297   CurC->Clear(); CurC->Divide(2,2); 
00298   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");  
00299   CurC->cd(1) ; if (gDirectory->Get("mass_e_correlation_strip")!=0) mass_e_correlation_strip->Draw(); 
00300   CurC->cd(2) ; if (gDirectory->Get("mass_sigma_vs_strip")!=0)      mass_sigma_vs_strip->Draw(); 
00301   CurC->cd(3) ; if (gDirectory->Get("good_carbon_events_strip")!=0) good_carbon_events_strip->Draw(); 
00302   CurC->cd(4) ; if (gDirectory->Get("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip")!=0)    mass_pos_dev_vs_strip->Draw(); 
00303   CurC->Update();   ps->NewPage();
00304   
00305   rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00306   CurC->cd(1) ; if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x90")!=0) asym_vs_bunch_x90 -> Draw(); 
00307   CurC->cd(2) ; if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x45")!=0) asym_vs_bunch_x45 -> Draw(); 
00308   CurC->cd(3) ; if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_y45")!=0) asym_vs_bunch_y45 -> Draw(); 
00309   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");
00310   CurC->cd(4) ; if (gDirectory->Get("spelumi_vs_bunch")!=0) spelumi_vs_bunch -> Draw(); 
00311   CurC->Update(); 
00312 }

00315 void AsymPlot::PlotErrorDetector(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps)
00316 {
00317   CurC -> SetGridx();   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);
00318   ps->NewPage(); CurC->Clear(); CurC->Divide(1,1); 
00319 
00320   // energy slope
00321   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");
00322   if (gDirectory->Get("energy_spectrum_all")!=0) {energy_spectrum_all->Draw(); CurC->Update();}
00323 
00324   // bunch detailes 
00325   rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00326   gStyle->SetStatStyle(0);
00327   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x90")!=0) {asym_vs_bunch_x90 -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00328   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x45")!=0) {asym_vs_bunch_x45 -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00329   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_y45")!=0) {asym_vs_bunch_y45 -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00330 
00331   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");
00332   gStyle->SetOptFit(111);
00333   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x90")!=0) {asym_bunch_x90   -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00334   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x45")!=0) {asym_bunch_x45   -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00335   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_y45")!=0) {asym_bunch_y45   -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00336   if (gDirectory->Get("spelumi_vs_bunch")!=0){spelumi_vs_bunch -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00337 
00338   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Bunch");
00339   if (IsOK("bunch_spelumi")) bunch_spelumi -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();
00340   if (IsOK("bunch_dist"))    bunch_dist    -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();
00341   if (IsOK("wall_current_monitor")) wall_current_monitor -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();
00342 
00343   // strip details
00344   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");
00345   if (IsOK("mass_e_correlation_strip")) mass_e_correlation_strip -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00346   if (IsOK("mass_sigma_vs_strip"))      mass_sigma_vs_strip      -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00347   if (IsOK("mass_chi2_vs_strip"))       mass_chi2_vs_strip       -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00348   if (IsOK("good_carbon_events_strip")) good_carbon_events_strip -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00349   if (IsOK("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip"))    mass_pos_dev_vs_strip    -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00350 
00351   // sin(phi) fit
00352   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00353   gStyle->SetOptFit(111); gStyle->SetOptStat(0);
00354   if (IsOK("asym_sinphi_fit")) asym_sinphi_fit->Draw(); CurC->Update();
00355 }

00358 // Description : Get histogram pointers from rootfile
00359 void AsymPlot::GetHistograms(TFile * rootfile)
00360 {
00361   rootfile->cd();
00362   rootfile->cd("ErrDet");  
00363   mass_e_correlation_strip   = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_e_correlation_strip");
00364   mass_sigma_vs_strip        = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_sigma_vs_strip");
00365   mass_chi2_vs_strip         = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_chi2_vs_strip");
00366   good_carbon_events_strip   = (TH1I*)gDirectory->Get("good_carbon_events_strip");
00367   mass_pos_dev_vs_strip      = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip");
00368   spelumi_vs_bunch           = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("spelumi_vs_bunch");
00369   bunch_spelumi              = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_spelumi");
00370   asym_bunch_x90             = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x90");
00371   asym_bunch_x45             = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x45");
00372   asym_bunch_y45             = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_y45");
00373 
00374   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00375   asym_vs_bunch_x90          = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x90");
00376   asym_vs_bunch_x45          = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x45");
00377   asym_vs_bunch_y45          = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_y45");
00378   asym_sinphi_fit            = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_sinphi_fit");
00379 
00380   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Bunch");
00381   bunch_dist                 = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_dist");
00382   wall_current_monitor       = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("wall_current_monitor");
00383   specific_luminosity        = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("specific_luminosity");
00384 
00385   // energy slope
00386   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");
00387   energy_spectrum_all        = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("energy_spectrum_all");
00388 }
00389 
00390 
00391 // Description : Search for root file in ./root directory. If the root file is not
00392 //             : found in ./root direcotry, then search for current working directory. 
00393 //             : The root file is accessed via symbolic link to the data file. If root
00394 //             : file is found in pwd, then the file is moved to root directry then
00395 //             : symbolic linked.
00396 void AsymPlot::FindRootFile()
00397 {
00398    // rootfile operation
00399    Char_t filename[50], text[100];
00400  
00401    // remove existing ./AsymPlot.root 
00402    sprintf(text,"rm -f %s", lnkfile); gSystem->Exec(text); 
00403  
00404    if (RUNID.empty()) RUNID = "7279.005"; // default
00405  
00406    // First search for ./root directory 
00407    sprintf(filename, "root/%s.root", RUNID.c_str());
00408    if (FileNotOK(filename)) {
00409       cout<< filename << " is not found. Search for pwd." << endl;
00410       sprintf(filename,"%s.root", RUNID.c_str()); // then look for pwd
00411       if (FileNotOK(filename)) { 
00412          cerr << "./" << filename << " is not found neither. Force exit." << endl;
00413          exit(-1);
00414       } else {
00415          sprintf(text,"mv -f %s root/.", filename); gSystem->Exec(text);
00416          sprintf(filename,"root/%s.root", RUNID.c_str());
00417       }
00418    }
00419    
00420    // make symbolic link from root/RUNID.root to ./AsymPlot.root
00421    sprintf(text, "ln -s %s %s", filename, lnkfile);
00422    gSystem->Exec(text);
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00426 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00427 {
00428    int opt, option_index = 0;
00429  
00430    static struct option long_options[] = {
00431      {"strip", 1, 0, 's'},
00432      {"banana", 0, 0, 'b'},
00433      {"feedback", 0, 0, 'F'},
00434      {"raw", 0, 0, 'r'},
00435      {"error-detector", 0, 0, 'e'},
00436      {"summary", 0, 0, 'S'},
00437      {"create", 1, 0, 'c'},
00438      {"file", 1, 0, 0},
00439      {0, 0, 0, 0}
00440    };
00441  
00442    while (EOF != (opt = getopt_long (argc, argv, "gerSFh?xf:s:b:", long_options, &option_index)))
00443    {
00444       switch (opt) {
00445       case -1:
00446         break;
00447       case 'b':
00448         PLOT_BANANA=1;
00449         ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00450         SUMMARY=0;
00451         break;
00452       case 'r':
00453         PLOT_BANANA=0;
00454         ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00455         SUMMARY=0;
00456         PLOT_RAW=1;
00457         break;
00458       case 'e':
00459         ERROR_DETECTOR=1;
00460         PLOT_BANANA=0;
00461         break;
00462       case 'g':
00463         GHOSTVIEW=1;
00464         break;
00465       case 'f':
00466         RUNID = optarg;
00467         break;
00468       case 'F':
00469         FEEDBACK=1;
00470         SUMMARY=0;
00471         ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00472         PLOT_BANANA=0;
00473         break;
00474       case 'S':
00475         SUMMARY=1;
00476         ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00477         PLOT_BANANA=0;
00478         break;
00479       case 's':
00480         stID=atoi(optarg);
00481         break;
00482       case 'h':
00483       case '?':
00484       case '*':
00485         Usage(argv);
00486         break;
00487       }
00488    }
00489 
00490    // load header file
00491    Char_t HEADER[100], text[100]; //, filename[100];
00492    sprintf(HEADER, "%s/AsymHeader.h", gSystem->Getenv("MACRODIR"));
00493    gROOT->LoadMacro(HEADER);
00494  
00495    AsymPlot asymplot;
00496    // open rootfile 
00497    asymplot.FindRootFile();
00498    TFile *rootfile = TFile::Open(lnkfile);
00499  
00500    // Log file handling
00501    ofstream logfile;
00502    logfile.open(".AsymPlot.log");
00503    if (logfile.fail())
00504      cerr << "Warning: Cannot open .AsymPlot.log." << endl;
00505  
00506    // setup color skime
00507    //  ColorSkime();
00508  
00509    // Cambus Setup
00510    TCanvas *CurC = new TCanvas("CurC","",1);
00511  
00512    // postscript file
00513    Char_t psfile[100];
00514    sprintf(psfile,"ps/AsymPlot_%s.ps", RUNID.c_str());
00515    TPostScript *ps = new TPostScript(psfile,112);
00516  
00517    asymplot.GetHistograms(rootfile);
00518  
00519    if (stID)           asymplot.PlotStrip(rootfile, CurC, ps, stID);
00520    if (FEEDBACK)       asymplot.PlotFeedback(rootfile, CurC, ps);  // Plot Feedback 
00521    if (PLOT_BANANA)    asymplot.PlotStrip(rootfile, CurC, ps);              // Plot Individual Strip
00522    if (SUMMARY)        asymplot.PlotErrorDetectorSummary(rootfile, CurC, ps);   // Plot Error Detector Summary
00523    if (ERROR_DETECTOR) asymplot.PlotErrorDetector(rootfile, CurC, ps);   // Plot Error Detector
00524    if (PLOT_RAW)       asymplot.PlotRaw(rootfile, CurC, ps);
00525  
00526    // close ps file
00527    cout << "ps file : " << psfile << endl;
00528    ps->Close();
00529  
00530    // close logfile
00531    //  logfile.close();
00532  
00533    // remove symboric link to root file in root directory
00534    //sprintf(text, "rm AsymPlot.root ", filename);    
00535    sprintf(text, "rm AsymPlot.root ");    
00536    gSystem->Exec(text);  
00537  
00538    sprintf(text,"gv -landscape %s",psfile);
00539    if (GHOSTVIEW) gSystem->Exec(text);
00540  
00541    return 0;
00542 }
